title: George Bernard Shaw
creator_credit: Triangle Productions, Theodora Olembert and Jan Read
brief_description: Using newsreel interviews and conversation with such people as Dame Sybil Thorndike and Kingsley Martin the film presents the personality of Shaw, the social critic whose plays cast a brilliant light on the political ideas struggling for expression at the turn of the century. Commentary by John van Eyssen and Tony Quinn.
